mapper.select: select p.place_total_seats, p.place_shape, s.section_seq, s.section_name, s.selection_col, s.selection_row from place p left outer join section s on s.place_seq = p.place_seq where p.place_seq=#{placeSeq} order by s.section_seq

select s.section_seq, s.section_name, sg.SECTION_SEAT_GRADES_SEQ, sg.SEAT_GRADE, sg.SEAT_ROW, sg.SEAT_COL_START, sg.SEAT_COL_END from section s left outer join SECTION_SEAT_GRADES sg on s.section_seq = sg.section_seq where s.place_seq=#{placeSeq} order by s.section_seq, sg.seat_row, seat_col_start

select DISTINCT TO_CHAR(schedule_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS schedule_date, CASE TO_CHAR(schedule_day, 'D') WHEN '1' THEN '일' WHEN '2' THEN '월' WHEN '3' THEN '화' WHEN '4' THEN '수' WHEN '5' THEN '목' WHEN '6' THEN '금' WHEN '7' THEN '토' END as day from SCHEDULE where application_seq=#{seq} and SCHEDULE_DAY > sysdate order by 1

select times from( select TO_CHAR(schedule_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS schedule_date, TO_CHAR(schedule_time, 'HH24:MI') AS times from SCHEDULE where application_seq=#{seq}) where schedule_date = #{date} order by times
select point from members where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into orders (order_seq, application_seq, member_id, order_date, total_price, status, delivery_status, pay, delivery_method,DELIVERY_SEQ) values (order_seq.nextval, #{seq}, #{id}, sysdate,#{totalPrice},#{status},#{deliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay}, #{deliveryMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deliverySeq,jdbcType=INTEGER})
select order_seq.currval from dual

insert into book (book_seq, order_seq, member_id, book_date, book_time, section_seq, book_row, book_col, book_level) values (#{bookSeq},#{orderSeq},#{id},#{date},#{time},#{storageSection},#{row},#{col},#{grade})
mapper.update: update members set point = #{point} where id=#{id}
